summary:
Scooby-Doo is a popular American cartoon franchise created in 1969 by Joe Ruby and Ken Spears. It follows a group of four teenage friends and their talking dog, Scooby-Doo, who travel in a van called the "Mystery Machine" to solve mysteries. The show is known for its funny moments and spooky adventures.

The original series aired on CBS and later moved to ABC, with various spin-offs and reboots over the years. It has been a huge success, ranking as one of the greatest TV cartoons by *TV Guide*. The franchise includes live-action movies and shows, with new series still being made today.
title: Scooby-Doo
